title: OCE ERROR/ QUEUE?
body:
Who else???

Now I got this...
http://postimg.org/image/f1pfu7lst/

anyone else?

replies.body: Thanks for the report, we're aware of this issue and are currently investigating - [check out this thread for updates](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/9rNOyg9Q-login-issues-and-client-disconnection-02022016) as we investgiate.
